item.description:
Update: We are going to Danvars, MA for a 10:45 pm show. Buy your own ticket, and call me if you are planning to come!

For all the people who are still stuck in Boston during vacations (like me).. and haven't yet seen this movie.. lets plan to see this on 24th. There is a 1:45pm show in IMAX theatre at Reading (a 20 minute drive from boston). We can carpool, looks like lot of people have cars, so those who don't should have a problem getting a ride.

RSVP soon, so that we can buy tickets in advance... last weekend all IMAX theaters were sold out! And IMAX 3D is better than 'Digital 3D' in regular theaters.

If this gets sold out, we can plan for Boston Commons AMC theater (digital 3d).
item.name: Movie - Avatar
